description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Il Sogno di Scipione voltato in Greco per Massimo Planude e fatto volgare per M. Zanobi da Strata. [Edited, with the Latin text, by S. Ciampi, with a Greek preface inscribed: Τῳ ἀναγιγωσκοντι Δ. Σ., i.e. D. Schinas. With a portrait of Ignatios, Metropolitan of Arta and Naupactus and afterwards of Ugro-Vlachia.]", "Single Works. De Republica. Somnium Scipionis. Latin, Greek and Italian" Author: Cicero, Marcus Tullius. Contributor: CIAMPI, Sebastiano. Contributor: PLANUDES, Maximus. Contributor: SCHINAS, Demetrios. Contributor: STRATA, Matteo Zanobio da. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 8404.dd.22.(2.)", "British Library HMNTS 525.f.32." Page: 7 Place of Publishing: Pisa Date of Publishing: 1816 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000704791 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
